subject: Re: [junit] Class not found Error
msgSnippet: hi lets assume class is SimpleMathTest.class and resides at c:java bin try at console following command c: java bin java -cp c:java bin;  SimpleMathTest why is
messageBody:
hi
lets assume class is SimpleMathTest.class and resides at c:java\bin
try at console following command
c:\java\bin\java -cp c:java\bin; SimpleMathTest

why is this?
may be your class path is not set

I'm not sure about your problem, lets see whether it works
bye

sowmya_jut <sowmya_jut@...> wrote:
Hi,

I am starting to use Junit for my new project.
Am getting the following error while running,

Class not found com: client name.Projectname.dao.AddressDAOTest.
Java.lang.Classnot foundException.com.clientname.Projectname.DAO.

Can you suggest to clear the error?

Let me know if query needs some more information.


Thank you and Regards,
Sowmya.
